RR.description: Sum of daily total precipitation amount.

RRm.description: Mean of daily total precipitation amount.

RR100week.long_name: Number of heavy precipitation weeks (precipitation >= 100 mm)
RR100week.description: Number of weeks with weekly total precipitation equal or above 100 mm.

RR1.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 1 mm.

R10mm.long_name: Number of heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 10 mm)
R10mm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 10 mm.

R20mm.long_name: Number of very heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 20 mm)
R20mm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 20 mm.

R25mm.long_name: Number of super heavy precipitation days (precipitation >= 25 mm)
R25mm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above 25 mm.

RYYmm.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation equal or above {thresh} mm.

DD.description: Number of days with daily total precipitation below {thresh} mm.

CDD.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive dry days (precipitation < {thresh} mm)
CDD.description: Maximum number of consecutive days with daily total precipitation below {thresh} mm.

CWD.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
CWD.description: Maximum number of consecutive days with daily total precipitation equal or above {thresh} mm.

DSP.long_name: Number of dry spells (periods >= {window} consecutive days with precipitation < {thresh} mm)
DSP.description: Number of occurrences of at least {window} consecutive days with daily total precipitation below {thresh} mm.

DSPx.long_name: Maximum lenght of dry spells (periods >= {window} consecutive days with precipitation < {thresh} mm)
DSPx.description: Maximum length of at least {window} consecutive days with daily total precipitation below {thresh} mm.

WSP.long_name: Number of wet spells (periods >= {window} consecutive days with precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
WSP.description: Number of occurrences of at least {window} consecutive days with daily total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

SDII.long_name: Annual mean precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
SDII.description: Annual mean total precipitation amount of days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

RX1day.description: Maximum total precipitation amount occurring within 1 day.

RXYYday.description: Maximum total precipitation amount occurring within {window} days.

RYYpABS.long_name: Total precipitation amount with precipitation > {per}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RYYpABS.description: Annual total precipitation amount of days with precipitation above the {per}th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

RYYp.long_name: Number of days with precipitation > {per}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RYYp.description: Number of days with daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm) > {per}th percentile during reference period) (days).

RYYpTOT.long_name: Precipitation fraction with precipitation > {per}th percentile on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RYYpTOT.description: Fraction of days with precipitation above the {per}th percentile of days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm.

RRYYp.long_name: {per}th percentile of daily precipitation amount on wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
RRYYp.description: {per}th percentile of daily total precipitation amount on days with total precipitation about or equal {thresh} mm.

PRCPTOT.long_name: Total precipitation amount of wet days (precipitation >= {thresh} mm)
PRCPTOT.description: Sum of daily total precipitation amount on days with total precipitation above or equal {thresh} mm).

FD.long_name: Number of frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
FD.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC.

CFD.long_name: Number of consecutive frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
CFD.description: Number of consecutive days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC.

FDD.long_name: Number of delayed frost days (minimum temperature < 0 degC)
FDD.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature below 0 degC during the months of April to June.

ID.long_name: Number of ice days (maximum temperature < 0 degC)
ID.description: Number of days with daily maximum temperature below 0 degC.

SU.long_name: Number of summer days (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
SU.description: Number of days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

CSU.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive summer days (maximum temperature > {threh} degC)
CSU.description: Maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above {tresh} degC.

TR.long_name: Number of tropical nights (minimum temperature > {thresh} degC)
TR.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature above {thresh} degC.

SQI.long_name: Number of uncomfortable sleep events (minimum temperature > {thresh} degC)
SQI.description: Number of days with daily minimum temperature above {thresh} degC.

HD17.long_name: Number of heating degree days (mean temperature < 17 degC)
HD17.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature below 17 degC.

GD.long_name: Number of growing degree days (mean temperature > {thresh} degC)
GD.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature above {thresh} degC.

GDYYx.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive growing degree days (mean temperature > {thresh} degC)
GDYYx.description: Maximum count of consecutive days with daily mean temperature above {thresh} degC.

CSDI.long_name: Cold spell duration index (days within periods >= {window} consecutive days with minimum temperature < 10th percentile)
CSDI.description: Number of days within periods of at least {window} consecutive days with minimum temperature below the 10th percentile.

WSDI.long_name: Warm spell duration index (days within periods >= {window} consecutive days with minimum temperature > 90th percentile)
WSDI.description: Number of days within periods of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above the 90th percentile.

CHDYY.long_name: Number of consecutive heat days (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
CHDYY.description: Number of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

CHDYYx.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive heat days (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
CHDYYx.description: Maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh} degC.

BVP.long_name: Annual beginning of vegetation period (day when number of consecutive days with mean temperature > 0 degC is >= 200 days)
BVP.description: Calendar day at which the count of consecutive days with daily mean temperature above 0 degC is above or equal 200 days.

WiMa.long_name: Number of days with {0} degC < mean temperature < {0} degC
WiMa.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature above {0} degC and below {0} degC.

TG90p.long_name: Fraction of days with mean temperature > 90th percentile
TG90p.description: Fraction of days with mean temperature above the 90th percentile.

TX90p.long_name: Fraction of days with maximum temperature > 90th percentile
TX90p.description: Fraction of days with maximum temperature above the 90th percentile.

TN90p.long_name: Fraction of days with minimum temperature > 90th percentile
TN90p.description: Fraction of days with minimum temperature above the 90th percentile.

TG10p.long_name: Fraction of days with mean temperature < 10th percentile
TG10p.description: Fraction of days with mean temperature below the 10th percentile.

TX10p.long_name: Fraction of days with maximum temperature < 10th percentile
TX10p.description: Fraction of days with maximum temperature below the 10th percentile.

TN10p.long_name: Fraction of days with minimum temperature < 10th percentile
TN10p.description: Fraction of days with minimum temperature below the 10th percentile.

FG.description: Mean of daily mean wind speed.

FGx.description: Maximum of daily mean wind speed.

FGn.description: Minimum of daily mean wind speed.

FX.description: Mean of daily maximum wind speed.

FXx.description: Maximum of daily maximum wind speed.

FXn.description: Minimum of daily maximum wind speed.

UFG.long_name: Mean daily mean u-component of wind speed
UFG.description: Mean of daily mean u-component wind speed.

VFG.long_name: Mean daily mean v-component of wind speed
VFG.description: Mean of daily mean v-component wind speed.

FG8.long_name: Number of gale days (maximum wind speed > 8 Bft)
FG8.description: Number of days with daily maximum wind speed above 8 Bft.

FG9.long_name: Number of severe gale days (maximum wind speed > 9 Bft)
FG9.description: Number of days with daily maximum wind speed above 9 Bft.

FG99th.long_name: Number of days with daily maximum wind speed > 99th percentile
FG99th.description: Number of days with daily maximum wind speed above the 99th percentile.

FGD.description: Mean of daily mean wind direction.

CW.long_name: Number of cold & wet days (mean temperature < 25th percentile & precipitation > 75th percentile)
CW.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature below the 25th percentile & total daily precipitation amount above the 75th percentile.

CD.long_name: Number of cold & dry days (mean temperature < 25th percentile & precipitation < 25th percentile)
CD.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature below the 25th percentile & total daily precipitation amount below the 25th percentile.

WW.long_name: Number of warm & wet days (mean temperature > 75th percentile & precipitation > 75th percentile)
WW.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature above the 75th percentile & total daily precipitation amount above the 75th percentile.

WD.long_name: Number of warm & dry days (mean temperature > 75th percentile & precipitation < 25th percentile)
WD.description: Number of days with daily mean temperature above the 75th percentile & total daily precipitation amount below the 25th percentile.

VPD.long_name: Vapour pressure deficit (difference between vapor pressure at saturation and ambient vapor pressure)
VPD.description: Vapour pressure deficit (difference between vapor pressure at saturation (derived from mean temperature and Magnus formulae) and ambient vapor pressure (derived from vapor pressure at saturation and relative humidity)).

CWB.description: Climatic water balance (difference between precipitation and evaporation (derived from latent heat flux and precipitation)).

DTR.long_name: Mean diurnal temperature range (difference between maximum and minimum temperature)
DTR.description: Mean diurnal temperature range (difference between daily maximum temperature and daily minimum temperature).

GSL.long_name: Growing season length (number of days between first occurrence >= 6 consecutive days with mean temperature > 5 degC and first occurrence >= 6 consecutive days with mean temperature < 5 degC
GSL.description: Number of days between the first occurrence of at least 6 consecutive days with daily mean temperature above 5 degC and the first occurrence (within the last 6 month) of at least 6 consecutive days with daily mean temperature below 5 degC.

CHDD30.long_name: Maximum number of consecutive dry heat days (maximum temperature > 30 degC & precipitation < 1 mm)
CHDD30.description: Maximum count of consecutive days with daily maximum temperature above 30 degC (hot days) and daily total precipitation below 1 mm (dry days).

HI.long_name: Number of hot & humid days (ambient vapor pressure > 18.8 hPa)
HI.description: Number of days with ambient vapor pressure (derived from vapor pressure at saturation (derived from mean temperature and Magnus formulae) and relative humidity) above 18.8 hPa.

HSf.long_name: Number of hot spells (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
HSf.description: Total number of series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh}.

HSx.long_name: Maximum length of hot spells (maximum temperature > {thresh} degC)
HSx.description: Longest series of at least {window} consecutive days with maximum temperature above {thresh}.

CSf.description: Total number of series of at least {window} consecutive days with temperature below {thresh}.

SD.long_name: Number of days with snow above {thresh} mm
SD.description: Number of days with solid precipitation flux above {thresh} mm (liquid water equivalent).

SCD.long_name: Number of days when the snow depth is greater than or equal to a {thresh} cm
SCD.description: Number of days with snow depth at or above {thresh} cm.

Sint.long_name: Mean snowfall during days with snowfall > {thresh} mm
Sint.description: Mean snowfall flux above {thresh} mm (liquid water equivalent).

Sfreq.long_name: Percentage of days with snowfall flux > {thresh} mm/day
Sfreq.description: Snowfall intensity is derived by dividing the total number of days with snowfall > {thresh} mm (liquid water equivalent) by the total number of days within the analysed time period.

UTCI.description: UTCI is the equivalent temperature for the environment derived from a reference environment and is used to evaluate heat stress in outdoor spaces.

WI.description: Number of days with daily temperature below {thresh} degC.

HW.long_name: Maximum length of heat waves (maximum temperature > {thresh_tasmax} degC), minimum temperature > {thresh_tasmin} degC)
HW.description: Number days with daily maximum temperature above {thresh_tasmax} degC and minimum temperature above {thresh_tasmin} degC).

GSS.long_name: Growing season start (mean temperature >= {thresh} degC), window >= {window} days)
GSS.description: Calendar day of year, when minimum {window} of days with daily mean temperature above or equal {thresh} degC.

GSE.long_name: Growing season end (mean temperature < {thresh} degC), window >= {window} days)
GSE.description: Calendar day of year after mid date (07-01), when minimum {window} of days with daily mean temperature below {thresh} degC.

FFS.long_name: Frost free season start (minimum temperature >= {thresh} degC), window >= {window} days)
FFS.description: Calendar day of the year, when for a minimum {window} of days the daily minimum temperature is consistently above or equal {thresh} degC.

FFE.long_name: Frost free season end (mean temperature < {thresh} degC), window >= {window} days)
FFE.description: Calendar day of the year after mid date (07-01), when for a minimum {window} of days the daily minimum temperature is consistently below {thresh} degC.
